2020-09-10 False Tools:Productivity TransIP DynDNS
[center][font size=4]TransIP DynDNS Changelog[/font][/center]
[font size=3]2020.09.08[/font] - Initial Release
Forked script from GitHub. This script polls your IP address and updates your DNS records in TransIP via their API.
https://registry.hub.docker.com/u/klokmeister/transip-dyndns/ https://github.com/SxMT/transip-dyndns SxMT/transip-dyndns
false false bridge <Config Name="TRANSIP_LOGIN" Target="TRANSIP_LOGIN" Default="" Mode="" Description="" Type="Variable" Display="always" Required="true" Mask="false"> <Config Name="TRANSIP_PRIVATE_KEY" Target="TRANSIP_PRIVATE_KEY" Default="" Mode="" Description="" Type="Variable" Display="always" Required="true" Mask="false">~/.secrets/transip_private_key.key <Config Name="TRANSIP_DOMAIN" Target="TRANSIP_DOMAIN" Default="" Mode="" Description="" Type="Variable" Display="always" Required="true" Mask="false"> <Config Name="TRANSIP_DNS_RECORD" Target="TRANSIP_DNS_RECORD" Default="" Mode="" Description="" Type="Variable" Display="always" Required="true" Mask="false">
